items.name: Bunny Hop
items.desc:
Bunny Hop is a hazy pale ale that is vegan friendly and gluten free! Our brew team have increased the percentage of oats to enhance the haziness and introduced dry hopping with El Dorado, Centennial and Azacca.
Bunny Hop is a bold beer, which perfectly balances its low abv of 3.5%, pale malts and powerful hops with an IBU 55.
Bunny Hop is perfectly suited to well spiced Mexican, Indian and Thai meat, fish or veg dishes.

items.name: Gluten Free Pack
items.desc:
Enjoy our range of Gluten Free, vegan friendly beers.
Bunny Hop, our extra hoppy, low ABV Hazy Pale, with pronounced bitterness and citrus flavour.
Session IPA, our moreish unfiltered SIPA, brimming with trpoical fruit notes and hop aromas.
Pure Helles Organic Lager, our take on a German Style lager, soft and rounded with a sweet dry, sparkling finish.
Gluten Free Pack includes:
Bunny Hop x 6
Session IPA x 3
Helles x 3
Mixed 4 pack of Pipers Crisps

items.name: IPA Pack
items.desc:
Explore our world of India Pale Ale, from from fruity session through to big bold and hoppy,
IPA Pack includes :
4 x Session IPA, 4.5% gluten free Session IPA brimming with tropical fruit
4 x Longhorn, 5% distinctive, full bodied american style rye IPA
2 x Saddle Black, 5.8% big, bold, gnarly black IPA
3 x Kveik, 5.8% , Limited Edition Big, bold and Juicy New England style IPA
2 x Prancing Pony India Red Ale, 7.4% Limited Edition double hoppy Red Ale and International Beer Challenge Supreme Champion Beer 2016

items.name: India Red Ale
items.desc:
World Best Winner 2016, our India Red Ale is brewed in partnership with the brilliant Prancing Pony Brewery from Adelaide, Australia. Renowned for their traditional brewing methods, Prancing Pony are an ‘All Grain and All Hop’ brewery meaning all of their beers are brewed using only the finest ingredients…much like us at Purity.
Based on the ‘American Imperial Double Red Ale’ India Red Ale has a cream thick head and is wonderfully red. It is well balanced and full bodied with a big dry hop character which creates intense fruit bowl aromas and flavours.
Tropical Fruit, Bold and Malty,
7.4% – 60 IBU
THIS BEER IS VEGAN FRIENDLY.

items.name: Lager Pack
items.desc:
Explore our select range of premium Lager from modern craft to classic Pilsener and Helles,
Purity Lager Pack includes :
8 x Lawless, 4.5% unfiltered, unpasteurised, 40 day matured vegan craft lager
4 x Pure Helles, 5% organic, gluten free german style lager
4 x Veltins Pilsener, 4.8% delicate and dry classic German pilsner

items.name: Lawless Lager
items.desc:
Lawless Lager, our maverick brew follows the 500- year-old Bavarian brewing law to achieve traditional purity using only four ingredients. We then added an idiosyncratic twist of our own, creating a blend of Hallertau Northern Brewer, Eldorado and Styrian Goldings hops. With Pilsner Malt, Wheat Malt, Caragold, lager yeast and our own mineral rich local water. Coolly lagered for 40 days – oh, and we slipped in a dash of hops, whilst no one was looking – for a sharp, citrusy kick.
Lawless Lager is best served with pot roasted sustainable cod (such as Skrei), chickpeas and chorizo.

items.name: Longhorn IPA
items.desc:
Longhorn IPA as in expertly brewed craft ale named after the herd of Longhorn Cattle that feed of Purity’s spent grains. We use only the finest natural ingredients to create and American style IPA that is full of character and which leaves you wanting more. Brewed with Maris Otter, Rye, Crystal Rye and Caramalt to create a copper warming colour and hopped with Pilgrim, Chinook, Galaxy and Simcoe hops, Longhorn has both citrus and tropical fruit tones.
Longhorn IPA is best served with beer BBQ glazed chicken, chived sour cream and fries. Also works great for beer can chicken

items.name: Mad Goose
items.desc:
Purity Mad Goose (4.2% ABV) is a zesty pale ale with a smooth and citrusy finish. Brewed with English Maris Otter, Caragold and Wheat malts, with Hallertau Northern Brewer bittering hops and Cascade and Willamette aroma hops. Winner of five awards.
Watch out for the Goose, her hiss is far worse than her bite, though she might drive you clucking mad, underneath it all she’s not that bad.
Mad Goose is best served with roast belly pork, buttered carrots and crispy black pudding

items.name: Organic Pure Helles
items.desc:
Following the Reinheitsgebot Purity laws of 1516, Pure Helles uses the finest English organic malt and hops with a blend of classic organic noble hops of the highest quality from Bavaria that give Pure Helles a clean, refreshing and bright appearance but with that unmistakable Purity character. Vegan-friendly and gluten-free.
Food match – Chicken Schnitzel, Charred Gem Lettuce, Caesar Mayo, Fries

items.name: Pure Cider
items.desc:
Pure Cider is created in partnership with Celtic Marches, artisan producers of premium quality cider. Exclusively sourced from the Frome Valley, Pure Cider is a medium, well rounded Herefordshire cider made from 100% Herefordshire apples. Every apple is picked from orchards within a 1.5 Mile radius of the Celtic Marches farm. They’re then pressed on the very same day. Pure Cider is authenticated by a protected geographical indicator (PGI) which certifies it is a genuine Herefordshire product.
An easy drinking 4.6% cider with a mellow flavour and slight tart finish. The cider is allowed to mature for 3-4 months to develop the very best flavour profile. Locally sourced mineral water is used in the fermentation process, creating a clean, crisp and easy drinking cider.
Pork Loin, Black Pudding, Sweetheart Cabbage & Smoked Pancetta, Pommes Anna & Plum Jus

items.name: Pure Gold
items.desc:
Pure Gold 4.3% is a refreshing golden ale with a dry and bitter finish. Brewed with English Maris Otter, Caragold and Wheat malts, plus Hallertau Northern Brewer, Bobeck and Hereford Goldings hops. Winner of nine awards.
Pure Gold is best served with lightly smoked salmon, buttered savoy cabbage and shallot sauce.

items.name: Pure Pub Bottle Edition
items.desc:
Are you missing going to the pub as much as we are? Well with the government advice for pubs and bars to close we want to bring the pub to your home.
We have two options for the Pure Pub Experience a bottle edition and a can edition.
Pure Pub Bottle Edition Contains:
3 x Bottles Pure UBU (4.5% Amber Ale)
3 x Bottles Pure Gold (4.3% Golden Ale)
3 x Bottles Mad Goose (4.2% Pale Ale)
1 x pack of Pipers Angelsey Sea Salt
1 x pack of Pipers Kirkby Malham Chorizo
1 x Purity Stemless half pint glass

items.name: Pure Pub Can Edition
items.desc:
Are you missing going to the pub as much as we are? Well with the government advice for pubs and bars to close we want to bring the pub to your home.
The Pure Pub Can Edition Contains:
4 x Cans Lawless Lager (4.5% Craft Lager)
4 x Cans Longhorn IPA (5.0% Rye IPA)
4 x Cans Saddle Black (5.8% Black IPA)
4 x cans Bunny Hop (3.5% Gluten Free Hazy Pale Ale)
4 x cans Pure Cider (4.6% Medium Cider)
2 x packs of Pipers Crisps
1 x Purity Stemless Half Pint Glass

items.name: Pure UBU
items.desc:
Pure UBU (pronounced ‘OO-BOO’) is named after our faithful canine friend ‘UBU’, a maverick, brim full of character and the unofficial protector of our secrets. God love him, the dog is mad, but an inspiration to all who enjoy doing what they do and who want to be loved for being what they are.
Pure UBU (4.5% ABV) is a distinctive, full flavoured beer with a sweeter finish. Brewed with English Maris Otter, Crystal, Black and Wheat malts, with Hallertau Northern Brewer and Cascade hops. Winner of seven awards.
Pure UBU is best served with red meats, game and strong cheeses.

items.name: Saddle Black
items.desc:
Saddle Black is a gnarly black beer using chinook and cascade hops to help give a full smoky and citrus aroma.
The roasted malts used to craft this full flavoured black beer will give a taste of chocolate and espresso, whilst the use the of smoked malt gives saddle black a well rounded finish. The aromas are a mix of black pepper, deep fruits, orange and spices. The mouth feel is full bodied and complex with a lingering bitter finish.
Saddle Black is best served with beef short ribs, beer BBQ beans, dirty mash with garlic butter and gravy.

items.name: Session IPA
items.desc:
A moreish, unfiltered session IPA, infused with real grapefruit peel and brimming with tropical fruit notes and hop aromas.
We’re proud of this great tasting session IPA but we can’t take any credit for the great looking design.
Working in partnership with students of the Birmingham School of Art this can has been designed by two talented final year students, Zunaira Muzafar and Beth Nicol. Winners of the Purity Seasonal Beer Design Award 2018
This beer is suitable for vegans and gluten free.
